text: Sort through the information with the Crew

title: Mission Description
content: The Crew stands united once more. Surprisingly, there's also aGalaxy Rangeramong your ranks who has been cleared of suspicion —Acheron.Based on a comprehensive assessment of information from various sources, you confirm thatThe Familyis indeed hiding a terrifying truth. Aventurine seems to have already detected traces of this and spared no effort in making preparations towards it, even secretly selecting you to be the agent to drive his plans forward.The distant broadcast confirms your thoughts. You must push forward — for the truth, justice for the deceased, andPenacony's future.

speaker: Himeko
line: Is this Miss Acheron? Hello, I'm Himeko, the Astral Express ' navigator.

speaker: March 7th
line: ▶ Hello, I'm March 7th! I'm sure ( Trailblazer ) needs no introduction, as you definitely know ( him / her ) .

text: Hey, I still deserve a proper intro!
Pleasure to meet ya, Miss Acheron.

speaker: Acheron
line: Hello. None of you seem surprised by my arrival.

speaker: Himeko
line: Since Welt has decided to travel with you, it means that he trusts you, and we trust his judgment.

speaker: Acheron
line: I envy your close friendships.

speaker: Welt
line: Miss Acheron here doesn't present a danger, and she's of no threat to the Astral Express. Aventurine 's prior accusation was based on nothing more than his own subjectivity.

speaker: Welt
line: Which is why, before we continue working together, he has a duty to explain himself.

speaker: Himeko
line: You want to... create a situation where all three parties are present?

speaker: Welt
line: There must be some deeper meaning behind Aventurine's actions. I suspect he's been aware of Penacony 's secret from the beginning... and has been continuously strategizing to unveil it.

speaker: Welt
line: In that sense, the Astral Express' role in his plans would be imperative. In the worst case scenario... he may use us to do something unexpected.

speaker: Welt
line: Assuming things do escalate to that stage, having an extra ally is a good insurance policy. Penacony has numerous factions, and the state of affairs is significantly more intricate than that of Belobog and the Xianzhou.

text: But we must mete out justice for the dead.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: ▶ (Trailblazer) is right. No matter what, we cannot ignore the safety of Penacony.

text: Maybe we should now get outta here while we still can?

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: ▶ (Trailblazer) also makes a good point. We're completely in the dark on what's going to happen next...

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: But, I think we can't just ignore the safety of Penacony.

text: I Am the Bone of My Bat. Stellaron Is My Body and Trailblaze Is My Blood.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: You're talking weird again... But it's a good vibe. No matter what, we can't ignore the safety of Penacony.

speaker: Himeko
line: To solve the mystery of the Watchmaker , it is crucial to get the IPC 's intel. The path ahead is fraught with danger... but what's Trailblazing without a little danger?

speaker: Welt
line: Sounds like we've reached a consensus. Now... Miss Acheron?

speaker: Acheron
line: I will accompany you, of course.

speaker: March 7th
line: Let's move out then! But... where do we start looking for him?

speaker: Himeko
line: No need to rush. If he truly has laid a trap... he will definitely use every means to lure us in.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Ladies and gentlemen...

speaker: Aventurine
line: The most wondrous, most magnificent show in Penacony's history is about to begin...

speaker: Aventurine
line: The IPC cordially invites everyone to — Clock Studios Theme Park!

speaker: Himeko
line: ...Look.

speaker: Himeko
line: Should both the performers and spectators fail to arrive, won't all of Aventurine's plans be for nothing?

speaker: Welt
line: Let's get going, everyone. The hour of trailblazing is upon us.

text: Head to the Clock Studios Theme Park

speaker: Himeko
line: To solve the mystery of the Watchmaker, it is crucial to get the IPC's intel. The path ahead is fraught with danger... but what's Trailblazing without a little danger?

speaker: Welt
line: Let's get going, everyone. The hour of trailblazing is upon us.

speaker: Acheron
line: I envy your close friendships.

speaker: March 7th
line: ▶ Mm... I have a bad feeling that something big's gonna go down. (Trailblazer), are you ready?

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Let's waste no time and head to the theme park then!

children.speaker: Acheron
children.line: ...Mr. Yang.

children.speaker: Acheron
children.line: Why did you not tell your companions about my true identity ?

children.speaker: Welt
children.line: It's just like you said: An inability rather than an unwillingness. Plus it's a long story... not something that can be summed up in a few words.

children.speaker: Welt
children.line: But I chose to believe you, and my trust in you stems more from... my own personal judgment.

children.speaker: Welt
children.line: ▶ I also believe that, if it were their choice to make, they would make the same one.

children.speaker: Acheron
children.line: Thank you, I'm grateful.

children.speaker: Acheron
children.line: To reciprocate, in the upcoming confrontation, if the odds aren't in the Astral Express' favor... I will stand with you.

children.speaker: Acheron
children.line: ...If my meager strength is required.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Your trauma isn't getting to you, is it... Take it easy. It'll be fine.

title: Mission Description
content: Aventurine seems to have waited for quite some time on the stage in the center of Clock Studios Theme Park......Join this crazed gambler for a perfect collaborative performance that will blow everyone in Penacony away.

speaker: March 7th
line: We're back here again. Aventurine actually chose a really conspicuous location...

speaker: March 7th
line: That guy's really taking it to a whole new level. Does he really think he's a superstar or something?

speaker: Himeko
line: Not a soul in sight? The Hounds drove out the visitors, and now their whereabouts are unknown too...

speaker: Himeko
line: Everyone, pay attention. The other party has obviously come prepared.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Ladies, gentlemen, dream seekers, tycoons, esteemed guests of the Watchmaker and The Family...

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Also not forgetting the Nameless of the renowned Astral Express! Welcome to the Interastral Peace Corporation's live show!

speaker: Aventurine
line: Astral Express, you're late, and this... "unsought guest."

speaker: Himeko
line: We've kept your appointment, Mr. Aventurine. It is customary to show yourself as well.

speaker: Aventurine
line: I will, naturally. But before that, I've got to introduce our guest of honor.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ▶ Everyone give it up for... ( Mr. / Miss ) Stellaron!

text: We're not here for any pageantry.
Does this have anything to do with the wanted murderer?

speaker: Welt
line: ▶ Let me remind you that in all likelihood, this stage and ( his / her ) identity have nothing to do with the wanted murderer.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Oh no, they do, of course they do. Otherwise, why would I work so hard to gain your trust and then invite you all here?

speaker: Aventurine
line: ▶ Because ( he / she ) is the only one who saw all three homicides. ( He / She ) is the key to proving that The Family's "death does not exist in dreams" promise is nothing but a sham!

speaker: Himeko
line: Three homicides?

speaker: Aventurine
line: That's right, madam — the third one is about to happen right now, right here in Clock Studios Theme Park ...

speaker: Aventurine
line: A truly grand death .

speaker: Aventurine
line: ▶ You, you, you, and you... All of you are going to die! And it's all because of you, ( Mr. / Miss ) Stellaron...

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...You will become the personification of "Death."

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: I thought my intent was crystal clear...

text: You sure you're gonna survive this?

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Don't underestimate the Preservation . The cornerstone of the Amber Lord will surely guide me...

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Never underestimate yourself. Like I said, you have the power to turn the tide on the entire game...

speaker: Aventurine
line: Let me be a little clearer: I will detonate the Stellaron in you, and cause a teeny-tiny accident on Penacony...

speaker: Aventurine
line: Bam! The entire theme park will be reduced to a shattered dream. Then, before The Family can even react, I'll become the IPC fleet's navigator.

speaker: Acheron
line: Your bluff isn't fooling anyone. If you could really do that, you would have done so earlier.

speaker: Aventurine
line: You wanna bet? Sure, I'll bet with you. I'm betting that it'll be a sweeping victory for me, by detonating an unprecedented explosion to prove that the vow of Harmony is a complete and utter joke.

speaker: Acheron
line: ...You won't do it.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Of course I can. It's just another gamble.

speaker: Aventurine
line: I came from the wastelands of Sigonia . For just sixty red copper coins, people paid to brand me, put me in chains, place me in the gallows, and bury me in the golden sands...

speaker: Aventurine
line: But the sun could not kill me, and the quicksand sent me back to the embrace of the Guild and the IPC. Bear in mind, my victory wasn't just a stroke of luck — I've never been defeated.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Have you ever heard the saying "Sleep is the rehearsal of death"? Why does life slumber? All because we are not ready for the final rest.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Every night is practice for the end. You and I are escaping into our dreams for fear of death at this very moment. And "Death"... will surface in our dreams.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Friends, the game has commenced, and you cannot choose to decline...

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Nor do you have any reason or grounds to.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: The dice are cast — Ladies and gentlemen, ready to unveil your cards?

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: The Architects ' flawed stone...

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Of no value at all.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: I'm putting down the bet.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: I'm taking the gamble.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: I'm claiming the win.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: I'll let fate spin the wheel, a daring gamble. Walking the brink of death... for rebirth.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: All for the Amber Lord!

text: (Begin battle againstTen Stonehearts: Aventurine of Stratagems×1)

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Alright, let's see who has the last laugh — let the game begin!

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Even on a losing streak, as long as people still have hope, they'll keep throwing money on the table...

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: The chance, no matter how small, the potential is what you hang onto. That's what justifies the gamble!

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Everybody's like that, down to the last player.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: So why can't I be happy too? Why can't I feel that free?

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Always hide your ace with a straight face...

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: I'm starting to get a bit impatient with you all.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Friends, to fully relish this—

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: I'm betting every last chip!

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Only by casting aside reason does one truly gamble...

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: " Emanator "— I know you'll match my wager.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Right?

text: Media:Trailblaze Mission When the Sacred Ginmill Closes.mp4

line: You're... leaving?

speaker: Acheron
line: Mhmm.

speaker: Acheron
line: Perhaps... I might pass through the place you mentioned.
Penacony...
What do you hope to find within a dream?

speaker: Acheron
line: I'm not looking for anything.

speaker: Acheron
line: They aren't in a dream.
I'm afraid The Family will not open the doors for you.

speaker: Acheron
line: Why?
Because the path you walk... is not accepted by the Harmony.

speaker: Acheron
line: Even if... that's not what I want?
Precisely because it's not what you want. Because THEY are not like other Aeons.
THEY have never glanced at anyone, and THEY never need to.
THEY leave woven strands of fate for humans to walk, and together, THEY weave a great shadow... And this shadow silently envelops them.

speaker: Acheron
line: There are always those who rise from the shadows.
They mostly become a part of the shadow.

speaker: Acheron
line: In your eyes, am I the same?
You still have a strand of color...
...But not much.

speaker: Acheron
line: ...That is enough.

speaker: Acheron
line: Before they vanish completely...

speaker: Acheron
line: I will reach the Nihility's end .

children.speaker: Acheron
children.line: I wish to mourn the departed, weeping like rain, to swell the crossing stream...

children.speaker: Acheron
children.line: ...as the tide arrives, leading you back home.

text: "This is where we go our own way."

title: Step Description
content: You have reached your final end.Bid your farewells to █████████ in your final moments. Try your best to......Die without regrets.

speaker: Aventurine
line: What... is this place?

speaker: Aventurine
line: A gigantic black hole, and... sea...

speaker: Aventurine
line: Have... Have I succeeded?
"...Welcome to this sad world, Kakavasha."
"Your good luck is the most precious wealth we — all Avgin have."
"If you come out alive after two days, it proves that you're the real deal."

text: "Our paths will cross again beneath the auroras."

line: "Wealth, status, power... the IPC will give you whatever you want, even what you don't want."
As for us, we will reunite in Kakava's next aurora.

speaker: Acheron
line: It's a pity this is not the place you were expecting.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Nihility ... is it?

speaker: Acheron
line: Perhaps to you, I am just an Emanator who's hiding her identity, but...

speaker: Acheron
line: The sleeping and shapeless never glance at anyone. THEY have no face, no form, and even less of a will to speak... The Nihility envelops everyone equally.

speaker: Acheron
line: Only some who have gone under THEIR shadow can go farther, tainting themselves with more Nihility... That's all.

speaker: Aventurine
line: That's all... My friend, you really leave me at a loss for words.

speaker: Aventurine
line: So... Is this my final destination, the land of the dead?

speaker: Acheron
line: This is all but a fleeting dream, one of the thousands of manifestations of IX... Under the watchful eye of Nihility, we momentarily linger here, before moving on to our own paths.

speaker: Aventurine
line: It seems that my death has already been determined.

speaker: Acheron
line: Even if you wish for it... I can't promise you anything.

speaker: Acheron
line: Now that you've accomplished your goal, I think you can be a little more forthcoming.

speaker: Aventurine
line: What do you mean?

speaker: Acheron
line: Your performance at the theme park was wonderful and grandiose... A simple yet practical technique that fooled almost everyone.

speaker: Acheron
line: No one would have ever thought that you would have gone to such lengths, even staking your life, just to prove a fact that had seemingly been disproved long ago...

speaker: Acheron
line: "'Real death' does not exist in Penacony's Dreamscape."

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Why would I do this?

speaker: Acheron
line: Because this is the only way you can uncover a secret that is even more unspeakable than the serial murders...

speaker: Acheron
line: To use this "dream death" to get there, to that promised land people constantly seek in this grand gathering...

speaker: Acheron
line: Penacony — the Legacy of the Watchmaker, the true land of exile.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...How did you find out?

speaker: Acheron
line: I never imagined that something I learned about unexpectedly would become the key to connecting everything.

speaker: Aventurine
line: It's that person' s identity, isn't it?

speaker: Acheron
line: I see you're in the know.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Let's just say I'd put money on the possibility.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...The murder isn't nearly enough to disrupt business as usual. Even if there were one or two murders on Penacony, most people wouldn't be personally affected — and that won't create any waves.

speaker: Aventurine
line: This dream of theirs isn't a boundless sea, it's a lonely island. The Family used the Harmony to build a high wall and isolate them from the vast and treacherous ocean of the outside world.

speaker: Aventurine
line: That barrier they built "keeps death out," but it also keeps the secrets that are lost in that watery abyss from floating to the surface. In a beautiful dream, free of suffering, who would want to go fishing for those secrets. No one. Unless...

speaker: Acheron
line: Unless someone goes to the other side of the barrier...

speaker: Acheron
line: ...And lives to tell the tale.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Someone already has.

speaker: Aventurine
line: I got the idea early on, chewing on that Masked Fool 's little hint. If a mute isn't "someone who cannot make a sound," then it has to be "someone who cannot speak."

speaker: Aventurine
line: Someone who survived the treacherous depths, but is unable to take the stage and speak the truth. I'm happy to know she's safe and sound, and still on Penacony.

speaker: Acheron
line: "Hint" ...is that not "proof"?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Proof is the one thing I don't have. The only thing that can prove these... conjectures... is for The Family to come clean. And with the way they buttered up these outsiders, it seems pretty clear they're intent on covering their tracks.

speaker: Aventurine
line: But you don't need proof to have a suspicion, and for me suspicion is enough. I didn't need to find the memory zone meme . I just needed for someone to kill me like it killed the silver-haired girl .

speaker: Acheron
line: You don't sound very confident to me. Going out of your way to make citywide broadcasts in an attempt to involve more people... You are simply betting on the possibility of someone being able to "break down the barrier."

speaker: Acheron
line: You're very lucky that fate has decided to let us cross paths. I happen to be equipped with a very sharp blade — sharp enough to slice through the veil of dreams. I can also carve the Harmony's brand off of you...

speaker: Acheron
line: You possess great cunning. Deliberately setting us up to be on opposing sides, constantly repeating the words of the Emanator in front of others, leaving me no choice but to draw my blade against you.

speaker: Acheron
line: And that's how you win. Opportunity and strategy, both are essential.

speaker: Acheron
line: And in your plans, the IPC always wins. Even if you lose the bet... To The Family, the life of an ambassador is still invaluable.

speaker: Aventurine
line: It's a huge gamble, isn't it? But, allow me to point out a mistake: The IPC's success is not guaranteed — I unfortunately have no contingencies for such an important matter.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Detonating a Stellaron... I can't do it. The aventurine stone is too broken to even safeguard my escape from the stage.

speaker: Aventurine
line: If at the end of the day you did not unsheathe your blade... I would have lost the bet.

speaker: Acheron
line: It is pointless to discuss "what-ifs." You have won. Your prize is an entry ticket into that deep sea.

speaker: Acheron
line: And after this, whether you can return from the abyss... is another gamble of yours.

speaker: Acheron
line: ...Have you never wavered?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Wavered? Of course I have. But I can only bank on my own good fortune.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Because other than that, I have nothing.

speaker: Acheron
line: ...Wake up from this dream and go to where you should be. Your gamble... is not over yet.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Before we part, can you answer one more question? As someone who has traveled on that road, can you tell me...

speaker: Aventurine
line: Why are we born into this world if it's just to die?

speaker: Acheron
line: I don't think this, and never have. Nor do you.

speaker: Aventurine
line: But the Nihility envelops you and I... and everyone.

speaker: Acheron
line: And because of that, it's pointless.

speaker: Aventurine
line: But it is still there.

speaker: Aventurine
line: If the dice of fate are always weighted, then that is our destiny. Why then... do we struggle against it?

speaker: Acheron
line: ...My answer might not be able to resolve your confusion, because it has been with you throughout your journey, and is already a part of your life.

speaker: Acheron
line: But you said, "Sleep is the rehearsal of death," so why does life slumber? Because we are not ready for the final rest.

speaker: Acheron
line: So you can definitely understand, why we want to be prepared.

speaker: Acheron
line: Even if the ending has been predetermined, that's fine. There are countless things that humans cannot change.

speaker: Acheron
line: But before the end, there are many things that humans can do while on their journey.

speaker: Acheron
line: And because of this, the "end" will thus reveal a completely different meaning.

speaker: Acheron
line: Take a good look at your pocket. Your friend has already given you the answer.

speaker: Acheron
line: ...Good luck.

children.text: The impossible in the Dreamscape is not "Death," but rather "Dormancy." Do stay alive. I wish you the best of luck.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Then I shall get going.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: Mister...

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: You're leaving? You ultimately chose to... leave this Dreamscape?

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Yes. Because they are not here... My papa, mama, and big sis...

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: Then where are they?

speaker: Aventurine
line: They are in a place where everyone will go. A very, very distant place.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: Then are you going too?

speaker: Aventurine
line: I'll get there, one day.

speaker: Aventurine
line: But not now.

speaker: Aventurine
line: There will come a day when the sky will drizzle, and I will hear the call of Gaiathra Triclops and know that it is time for me to go and be reunited with my family.

speaker: Aventurine
line: So until the time comes... I should be preparing.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: Preparing for what?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Preparing to face them, Kakavasha, and to make them proud.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: I know you'll be able to do it. Good luck!

speaker: Aventurine
line: Of course. For I am a child who received the blessing of Gaiathra Triclops.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: But you still seem nervous...

speaker: Aventurine
line: I seem that way because I am nervous. You know what? Maybe you can help...

speaker: Aventurine
line: What do you say? One last time? Put our palms together?

children.speaker: "Kakavasha"
children.line: Are you going now?

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: Yes.

children.speaker: Aventurine
children.line: "May the Mother Goddess thrice close her eyes for you..."

children.speaker: Aventurine and "Kakavasha"
children.line: ...keeping your blood eternally pulsing."

children.speaker: Aventurine and "Kakavasha"
children.line: "May your journey be forever peaceful..."

children.speaker: Aventurine and "Kakavasha"
children.line: "...and your schemes forever concealed."

children.speaker: "Kakavasha"
children.line: Our paths will cross again beneath Kakava's shimmering auroras.

children.speaker: "Kakavasha"
children.line: Farewell, Kakavasha.

text: "With hope for the morrow nestled in my heart, I descend into the slumber of tonight. Until the denouement of all coming morrows kisses me, I have then embraced the quiet death."
But this man is different. He lives and breathes in the present. In every sinking night, by every daring gamble, no vision of morrow ever graced his dreams.
His life knows not quietude. His fate yet demands him to win them all, to weather tempests, one after another... til mire enshrouds his very breath.
And now, in the unfathomable depths of dream, the once falling die... has at last landed on its earthly rest.
Quietly, peacefully, it at last landed.

speaker: Topaz
line: The light of the aventurine stone... has disappeared.

speaker: Topaz
line: This only represents one outcome...

speaker: Jade
line: He kept his promise...

speaker: Jade
line: ...And got what he wanted.

speaker: Topaz
line: As planned, your cornerstone has been successfully sent to The Family's territory. Then—

speaker: Jade
line: —Let's fulfill our duty and start "harvesting."

text: Thereafter, in the cradle of slumberers, deep within the sweet dream of the Planet of Festivities —
Another stone begins to radiate light.

speaker: Jade
line: "I come for an audience, I come to fill wine, and I come to claim."

speaker: Jade
line: "I bestow poison in the guise of sweet dew. Come the toil of spring and yield of fall, I patiently wait for the branches to be heavy with withered fruits."

speaker: Jade
line: "All for the... Amber Lord."

text: You try to open your eyes, but find only blackness before you.

Memories gradually resurface as time rewinds to a few minutes ago: Aventurine unleashes the final assault, pouring down a dazzling shower of chips, followed closely by Acheron drawing her blade, and then, *crash*—

The indescribable force severs the power of Preservation, while time and space froze instantly. Your thoughts twist into a knot as your senses fail, with only gravity tearing at your mind as you plummet into boundless darkness...
...until a fire engulfs you in its embrace.
Doesn't matter. I need to get out of here.

speaker: Sam
line: ...You're awake.

speaker: Sam
line: I've been waiting on you for quite a while.

children.speaker: Sam
children.line: You've met me before — I'm Sam — the Stellaron Hunter .

children.speaker: Sam
children.line: A crevice between dreams. You've met me before — I'm Sam — a Stellaron Hunter.

text: It's you... what have you done?

children.speaker: Sam
children.line: I didn't do anything but wait for you to wake up. You've met me before, I'm Sam — a Stellaron Hunter.

speaker: Sam
line: I originally planned on showing up earlier to reveal some truths to you.

speaker: Sam
line: But I encountered more roadblocks than expected. Eleven times, I've tried, but ended in failure. Before I knew it, this world and I became too intertwined and it became too difficult to escape the constraints of the "script."

speaker: Sam
line: ... Elio is right. In this Land of the Dreams, you and I will reap unforgettable gains.

speaker: Sam
line: I don't know people's hearts as well as he and Kafka do, nor do I have a specialty like Silver Wolf and Blade . Most of the things that I'm good at only apply to villains who need no mercy.

speaker: Sam
line: So, there is only one method that I use.

children.speaker: Sam
children.line: This is to show to you...

children.speaker: Firefly
children.line: ...all that I am.

speaker: Gallagher
line: Labyrinth-like corridors and halls, traps everywhere... The owner of this mansion must be a bit paranoid.

speaker: Sunday
line: You're so funny, Mr. Security Officer. I hope that sense of humor of yours has helped you find the serial killer.

speaker: Gallagher
line: Just expressing a personal opinion. Why, did I hit a nerve?

speaker: Sunday
line: Mr. Gallagher, my patience is wearing thin. Neglecting duties...

speaker: Sunday
line: ...will only make me more suspicious that you and the real serial killer are connected.

speaker: Gallagher
line: Scoundrel, punk, drunk, hooligan... I've heard this trash talk all too often. But I have never once thought that I'd be treated as an accomplice to a murderer!

speaker: Gallagher
line: I take back what I said: Your problem isn't paranoia. You're just crazy, you know? Lunatic.

speaker: Gallagher
line: You — The Family — you broke my spine and pulled out my fangs, and now you want to accuse me of murder? Ridiculous, only idiots who've drunk too much SoulGlad will berate a stray dog on the streets.

speaker: Gallagher
line: What exactly is making you say all this nonsense? You should be more concerned about the outworld visitors who are making a scene in the theme park than me!

speaker: Sunday
line: I don't need you to remind me. The moment that ambassador walked out the doors of the mansion, I knew what he was trying to do. My servants see everything. His little magic tricks may have fooled me, but no matter, I'm happy to see how things have turned out.

speaker: Sunday
line: Why do you think that I just let him go? And why do you think I emptied the theme park stage?

speaker: Sunday
line: Because my target from the beginning has always been you, Hound. The more noise he makes, the more opportunities I have to make you and your true master pay in blood!

speaker: Gallagher
line: If I were really the murderer, why would you need to be so secretive? Ha, I forgot, you also have a difficult master to serve — telling you to ignore the murder case and focus solely on that Charmony Festival ...

speaker: Gallagher
line: ...Isn't that right, my brother ?

speaker: Sunday
line: ...Looks like your disguise has helped you successfully understand every facet of The Family.

speaker: Gallagher
line: Disguise? You must be blind to be accusing me of being a fake. Open your eyes and take a good look...

speaker: Sunday
line: Indeed, every part of you is real. The brown hair, soft and curly like Benny 's ; the orange eyes, which make me miss the gaze of Sir Whittaker ; that odd scar, the mark of Woolsey ...

speaker: Sunday
line: And the gray vest, tie, Hound Emblem, bottle, the bartending and your role as a security officer... These are all true traits...

speaker: Sunday
line: ...from all fifty-two loyal Family members .

speaker: Sunday
line: When they are gathered, countless tiny truths are woven together into a lie — you collected a small piece of each of them and claimed them for yourself. Then you invented this facade, a complete Gallagher...

speaker: Sunday
line: ...Tell me I'm wrong, minion of the Enigmata .

speaker: Gallagher
line: Haha...

speaker: Gallagher
line: Hahahaha! You have guts. I'll give you that! Not bad. I severely underestimated you...

speaker: Gallagher
line: Admirable. But so what? Can this prove that I murdered your sister and that stowaway?

speaker: Sunday
line: This proves that you and the Memory Zone Meme "Death" are linked — and that's enough.

speaker: Sunday
line: Listen up. I don't care how you did it... I only care about one thing, the answer to a question...

speaker: Sunday
line: ...You devil! You wretched, despicable dog, why did you kill her!?

children.speaker: Gallagher
children.line: You know, in the thick of things, people are blind to the grit in their eyes...

children.speaker: Gallagher
children.line: ...yet they can always feel its scratch.

children.speaker: Gallagher
children.line: Want the answer?

children.speaker: Gallagher
children.line: I'll give it to you.

children.speaker: Gallagher
children.line: The whole thing is just fate playing a cruel joke on us.

text:
(Receive message from Aventurine)
(Note: Available after at least one dayreset. The player must ownAventurineAventurine.)
